## blockRendering.Field.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Field` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(constants: ConstantProvider, field: BlocklyField, parentInput: Input);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  constants | [ConstantProvider](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.md) | The rendering constants provider. |
|  field | [BlocklyField](./blockly.field.md) | The field to measure and store information for. |
|  parentInput | [Input](./blockly.input.md) | The parent input for the field. |
